author: fwyzard
body:
Follow up of the work in #21652 .

Rename private `book...` methods to `book..._` to reduce the ambiguity of the public vs private interface.

Update the `ConcurrentMonitorElement` class:
  - fix the `lock_guard` used in the move constructor
  - use a `tbb:spin_mutex` in place of a `std::mutex`

On a microbenchmark, when guarding a small code section `tbb:spin_mutex` is twice as fast as `std::mutex` if there is no contention, and even faster as the number of threads increase.
title: more DQM-related developments, fixes and improvements
